chapter.title: Before You Install OpenAM Software
chapter.para: This chapter covers software and hardware prerequisites for installing and running OpenAM software. If you have a special request to support a component or combination not listed here, contact ForgeRock at info@forgerock.com.

section.title: Java Requirements
section.para: This release of OpenAM requires Java Development Kit 1.6, at least 1.6.0_10. For better performance and security, use at least 1.6.0_22.
ForgeRock has tested this release of OpenAM primarily with Oracle Java SE JDK.
OpenAM Java SDK requires Java Development Kit 1.5 or 1.6.

section.para: If running as a non-root user, the web application container must be able to write to its own home directory, where OpenAM stores configuration files.

section.title: Data Store Requirements

itemizedlist.para: This release of OpenAM works with the following configuration data stores.

listitem.para: Embedded (using ForgeRock OpenDJ 2.4.4 for the data store)
When using the embedded configuration store, you must deploy OpenAM on a local file system and not on an NFS-mounted file system.

section.title: Hardware Requirements
section.para: You can deploy OpenAM on any hardware supported for the combination of software required. Deploying OpenAM requires a minimum of 1 GB free RAM over and above the RAM used by all other software on the system.
ForgeRock has tested this release of OpenAM primarily on x86 and x64 based systems.
